name: 廃病院探索
description:
Exploring abandoned hospitals
This is a free game.
It's my first work, but I hope you enjoy it even a little.

The protagonist heads to an abandoned hospital at the request of a friend...

A first-person horror game about finding out what happened in an abandoned hospital.
*Some grotesque and unpleasant scenes

·ending
Two types are available.

・Play time
20 to 30 minutes (assumed)

·atmosphere
I tried to reproduce it so that it feels real.

·save
Autosave only

We welcome live commentary and distribution!
